name: part_007
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs 'Ai wo Komete Hanataba wo'.
Sakamata Chloe talks to the audience after the song, expressing her gratitude.
A 'Now Loading...' screen appears with Sakamata Chloe speaking over the background music.

subtitles.original: ありがとう...
subtitles.english: Thank you...

subtitles.original: ここにいられて本当によかったわ
subtitles.english: I'm so glad to be here

subtitles.original: このこみあげる気持ちが愛じゃないなら
subtitles.english: If this surging feeling isn't love

subtitles.original: 何が愛かわからないほど
subtitles.english: Then I don't know what love is

subtitles.original: 愛をこめて花束を 大袈裟だけど受け取って
subtitles.english: A bouquet with love, it's exaggerated but please accept it

subtitles.original: 理由なんて聞かないでよね
subtitles.english: Don't ask me for a reason, okay?

subtitles.original: 今だけすべて忘れて 笑わないで受け止めて
subtitles.english: Forget everything just for now, don't laugh and accept it

subtitles.original: 照れていないで
subtitles.english: Don't be shy

subtitles.original: 昨日とよく似た今日は なにげない別れ道
subtitles.english: Today, so similar to yesterday, is a casual fork in the road

subtitles.original: 分かって選びそびれた 臆病なせいでした
subtitles.english: I understood but missed the chance to choose, it was because of my cowardice

subtitles.original: 私は甘えるのが得意で
subtitles.english: I'm good at being pampered

subtitles.original: 最初から慰めをあてにしてたわ
subtitles.english: I was counting on consolation from the start

subtitles.original: 何度も間違った道 選び続けて
subtitles.english: Choosing the wrong path over and over again

subtitles.original: 正しくここに戻ってきたの
subtitles.english: I correctly returned here

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る時を越え いつもあなたのところへと
subtitles.english: Crossing time that goes round and round, always to where you are

subtitles.original: この心 舞い戻ってゆく
subtitles.english: This heart will come back to you

subtitles.original: 無理に描く理想より 笑い合える今日の方が
subtitles.english: Rather than an ideal drawn by force, today where we can laugh together

subtitles.original: ずっと幸せね
subtitles.english: Is much happier

subtitles.original: Violet, indigo, black and blue
subtitles.english: Violet, indigo, black and blue

subtitles.original: Flame, orange, yellow, purple, sky, blue
subtitles.english: Flame, orange, yellow, purple, sky, blue

subtitles.original: Pink, yellow, green, ash, brown
subtitles.english: Pink, yellow, green, ash, brown

subtitles.original: あなたに贈る色は...
subtitles.english: The colors I send to you are...

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る時を越え いつもあなたのところへと
subtitles.english: Crossing time that goes round and round, always to where you are

subtitles.original: この心 舞い戻ってゆく
subtitles.english: This heart will come back to you

subtitles.original: ありがとうを言い出せずに 甘えていた今日ここまでは
subtitles.english: Without being able to say thank you, I was pampered up until today here

subtitles.original: 愛をこめて花束を
subtitles.english: A bouquet with love

subtitles.original: 大袈裟だけど受け取って
subtitles.english: It's exaggerated but please accept it

subtitles.original: 理由なんて聞かないでよね
subtitles.english: Don't ask me for a reason, okay?

subtitles.original: 今だけすべて忘れて 笑わないで受け止めて
subtitles.english: Forget everything just for now, don't laugh and accept it

subtitles.original: 本当の私も
subtitles.english: Even the real me

subtitles.original: いつまでもそばにいて
subtitles.english: Stay by my side forever

subtitles.original: どうでしたかみんな？
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: 花束受け取ってくれましたか？
subtitles.english: Did you receive the bouquet?

subtitles.original: 沙花叉の気持ち、ちょっと本当に投げさせていただきました。
subtitles.english: I really threw Sakamata's feelings at you for a bit.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: いや沙花叉ね、本当に普段からみんなには感謝をしていて、
subtitles.english: Well, Sakamata is really grateful to everyone on a regular basis,

subtitles.original: ちょっとお言葉を伝えるのが下手っぴなのであんまり言えないのですが、
subtitles.english: I'm a bit bad at putting it into words, so I can't say it much, but...

subtitles.original: あの、いつもありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Um, thank you always.

subtitles.original: 大好きです。
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: あ、でもなん誕生日のお祝いなのに、なんか足りないな。
subtitles.english: Ah, but even though it's a birthday celebration, something's missing.

subtitles.original: もっと、もっとなんかお誕生日感欲しいな。
subtitles.english: I want more, more of a birthday feeling.

subtitles.original: ね、もっともっと、もっともらえるよね、いいよね？
subtitles.english: Right, I can get more, more, it's okay, right?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、みんな、言っちゃいますか？
subtitles.english: Then, everyone, shall we say it?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、次のステージに行っちゃおうかな。
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll go to the next stage.

subtitles.original: いきまーす！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: せーの、レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: One, two, let's go!

subtitles.original: みんなお祝いしてくれてありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thanks for celebrating everyone!

subtitles.original: ちょっと沙花叉さ、このお誕生日で一つ強くなったと思うので、
subtitles.english: I think Sakamata became one step stronger with this birthday,

subtitles.original: 皆さんにですね、沙花叉の強くなっちゃったところ、見せちゃいたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So I'd like to show you all how Sakamata has become stronger!
